item.title: Config of Jupyter Lab on WSL2
item.description: Install JupyterLab Run conda install -c conda-forge jupyterlab Config Browser of WSL2 Find browser’s path, my Chrome’s path is /mnt/c/Program\ Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chrome.exe. Create a quick link sudo ln -s /mnt/c/Program\ Files/Google/Chrome/Application/chrome.exe /usr/bin/chrome. (Try if this work chrome www.youtube.com) Run gedit /.~bashrc, and add browser to its last line export BROWSER='/usr/bin/chrome' Edit Jupyter Config File Generate jupyter config file jupyter notebook --generate-config Open it gedit ~/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py, find c.NotebookApp.use_redirect_file and set it to False.

item.title: WSL2 on Win11
item.description: Since many insteresting projects’ environment only support Linux and many homeworks of computer science courses can only work on Linux, it is necessary for us to have one. But most laptop’s OS is Windows, so the optional of having a Linux OS are follow: Dual System; Virtual Machine. Installing a dual system is complicated, and it’s trouvlesome to frequently reboot when you want to use softwares installed on Windows and coding on Linus at same time.

item.title: Install MMdetection with docker on WSL2
item.description: Installation of some projects can be really hard in China due to the Internet problem, so this blog records how to install mmdetedtion with dockerfile on WSL2. This blog at least work on my laptop: Win11 + WSL2 + NVIDIA-RTX-3070 Table of Contents 1. Download MMdetection 2. Modification to Dockerfile 3. Basic Docker commond 3.0 Install docker 3.1 Status 3.2 Remove 3.3 Use 1.

item.title: Build Personal Website with Hugo
item.description: This is a brief introduction about how to build a personal website with hugo! The following steps has worked on my Ubuntu20.04. Table of Contents Install Hugo Create Blog with Hugo Choose a Theme Deploy to Github Install Hugo Open a terminal, and run sudo apt-get install hugo. Then, run hugo version to see if the installation is successful. If it’s successful, it should output the version of hugo, mine is

item.title: Transformer
item.description: Transformer “Attention is all you need” is a paper published on NIPS2017, conducted by 8 excellent machine learning scientists when they were in Google Brain. It proposed a network architecture, the Transformer, based solely on attention mechanisms, dispensing recurrence and convolutions entirely. It was originally used on translation tasks and achieved SOTA performance. However, it has been later applied in all different tasks in not only NLP but CV as well.

item.title: Math in LaTeX
item.description:
行内与独行 行内公式：将公式插入到本行内，符号：$公式内容$，如：$xyz$ 独行公式：将公式插入到新的一行内，并且居中，符号：$$公式内容$$，如：$$xyz$$ 上标、下标与组合 上标符号，符号：^，如：$x^4$ 下标符号，符号：_，如：$x_1$ 组合符号，符号：{}，如：${16}{8}O{2+}{2}$ 汉字、字体与格式 汉字形式，符号：\mbox{}，如：$V_{\mbox{初始}}$ 字体控制，符号：\displaystyle，如：$\displaystyle  rac{x+y}{y+z}$ 下划线符号，符号：\underline，如：$\underline{x+y}$ 标签，符号	ag{数字}，如：$	ag{11}$ 上大括号，符号：\overbrace{算式}，如：$\overbrace{a+b+c+d}^{2.0}$ 下大括号，符号：\underbrace{算式}，如：$a+\underbrace{b+c}_{1.0}+d$ 上位符号，符号：\stacrel{上位符号}{基位符号}，如：$\vec{x}\stackrel{\mathrm{def}}{=}{x_1,\dots,x_n}$ 占位符 两个quad空格，符号：\qquad，如：$x \qquad y$ quad空格，符号：\quad，如：$x \quad y$ 大空格，符号\，如：$x \ y$ 中空格，符号\:，如：$x : y$ 小空格，符号\,，如：$x , y$ 没有空格，符号``，如：$xy$ 紧贴，符号\!，如：$x ! y$ 定界符与组合 括号，符号：（） ig( ig) \Big(\Big)  igg( igg) \Bigg(\Bigg)，如：$（） ig( ig) \Big(\Big)  igg( igg) \Bigg(\Bigg)$ 中括号，符号：[]，如：$[x+y]$ 大括号，符号：\{ \}，如：${x+y}$ 自适应括号，符号：\left ight，如：$\left(xight)$，$\left(x{yz}ight)$ 组合公式，符号：{上位公式 \choose 下位公式}，如：${n+1 \choose k}={n \choose k}+{n \choose k-1}$ 组合公式，符号：{上位公式 \atop 下位公式}，如：$\sum_{k_0,k_1,\ldots>0 \atop k_0+k_1+\cdots=n}A_{k_0}A_{k_1}\cdots$ 四则运算 加法运算，符号：+，如：$x+y=z$ 减法运算，符号：-，如：$x-y=z$ 加减运算，符号：\pm，如：$x \pm y=z$ 减甲运算，符号：\mp，如：$x \mp y=z$ 乘法运算，符号：	imes，如：$x 	imes y=z$ 点乘运算，符号：\cdot，如：$x \cdot y=z$ 星乘运算，符号：\ast，如：$x \ast y=z$ 除法运算，符号：\div，如：$x \div y=z$ 斜法运算，符号：/，如：$x/y=z$ 分式表示，符号： rac{分子}{分母}，如：$ rac{x+y}{y+z}$ 分式表示，符号：{分子} \voer {分母}，如：${x+y} \over {y+z}$ 绝对值表示，符号：||，如：$|x+y|$ 高级运算 平均数运算，符号：\overline{算式}，如：$\overline{xyz}$ 开二次方运算，符号：\sqrt，如：$\sqrt x$ 开方运算，符号：\sqrt[开方数]{被开方数}，如：$\sqrt[3]{x+y}$ 对数运算，符号：\log，如：$\log(x)$ 极限运算，符号：\lim，如：$\lim^{x 	o \infty}_{y 	o 0}{ rac{x}{y}}$ 极限运算，符号：\displaystyle \lim，如：$\displaystyle \lim^{x 	o \infty}_{y 	o 0}{ rac{x}{y}}$ 求和运算，符号：\sum，如：$\sum^{x 	o \infty}_{y 	o 0}{ rac{x}{y}}$ 求和运算，符号：\displaystyle \sum，如：$\displaystyle \sum^{x 	o \infty}_{y 	o 0}{ rac{x}{y}}$ 积分运算，符号：\int，如：$\int^{\infty}_{0}{xdx}$ 积分运算，符号：\displaystyle \int，如：$\displaystyle \int^{\infty}_{0}{xdx}$ 微分运算，符号：\partial，如：$ rac{\partial x}{\partial y}$ 矩阵表示，符号： egin{matrix} \end{matrix}，如：$\left[  egin{matrix} 1 &2 &\cdots &4\5 &6 &\cdots &8\vdots &\vdots &\ddots &\vdots\13 &14 &\cdots &16\end{matrix} ight]$ 逻辑运算 等于运算，符号：=，如：$x+y=z$ 大于运算，符号：>，如：$x+y>z$ 小于运算，符号：<，如：$x+y<z$ 大于等于运算，符号：\geq，如：$x+y \geq z$ 小于等于运算，符号：\leq，如：$x+y \leq z$ 不等于运算，符号：

item.title: Foundation of RL
item.description: Table of Contents Foundation of RL 1. Markov Decision Process, MDP 2. Dynamic Process, DP 3. Monte Carlo Methods, MC 4. Temporal Difference, TD Foundation of RL This blog will briefly introduce Markov decision process (MDP), dynamic process (DP), Monte Carlo methods (MC), temporal difference (TD). 1. Markov Decision Process, MDP A MDP is defined by:

item.title: Right click in File Explorer of Win11
item.description: When right click on files in file explorer in Win11, it is simplified. To make it show as previous version, like Win10, I have to first right click, then select ‘show more options’. It’s too complicated. Run cmd as administrator: reg.exe add "HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID\{86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2}\InprocServer32" /f /ve Then rerun the File Explorer. When wantting to change back to win11’s simplified mode, run cmd as administrator: reg.exe delete "HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID\{86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2}\InprocServer32" /va /f
